峬峬峬

峬字的基本解释

峬
bū
〔峬峭〕形态优美的样子，亦泛指风姿、文笔优美，如“诗章易作，峬峬难为。”

峬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bū］
［《廣韻》博孤切，平模，幫。］
见“峬峭”。

峬字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峬； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页311第21
【廣韻】博孤切【集韻】奔謨切，?音逋。【廣韻】峬峭，好形貌。出字林。

峬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
峬字的起名意思

形容形态优美的样子，亦泛指风姿、文笔优美。

峬
Basic explanation of words
峬
bū
〔峬Qiao〕The graceful appearance also refers to the graceful posture and the beautiful writing style, such as "Poetry is easy to write, but it is difficult to make a poem."
峬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bū］
["Guang Yun" Bo Gu cut, flat mold, help. ]
See "峬Qiao".
峬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峬; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 311 21
[Guangyun] Bo Guqie [Jiyun] Benmoqie, sound blunted. [Guangyun] 峬Qiao, good appearance. Out of the word forest.
峬

峬
Name meaning
Describing a beautiful appearance, it also refers to grace and graceful writing.
